cause.description:
Sign the petition on http://www.lifenets.net/nofly/noflyA.php that will help to get the no-fly zone passed and to see which candidates support the effort in Darfur.
1. Sign the petition. http://www.lifenets.net/nofly/noflyA.php
2. "we have the capacity"-Joseph Biden
cause.mission: create a no fly zone in the Sudan that will stop the arial attacks
cause.name: No-Fly Zone
